src/parallel/ll-src/vtkplane.f File Reference

Detailed Description

Save order parameter, pressure, and velocity data in VTK format for the D2Q9 Lee-Lin multiphase LBM. Filenames are 'DATA_XXXXXXX.VTK' where XXXXXXX is the time step. These files are understood by Paraview.
